cui_name: Acute lymphoblastic leukemia with lymphomatous features
reasoning: ALL incidence ~2-3 per 100k globally from GLOBOCAN. Lymphomatous features are a specific morphological variant. Confidence based on registry quality and specific subtype uncertainty.
source: Parkin DM et al. (2005). Global cancer statistics, 2002. CA Cancer J Clin. 55(2):74-108
